description: The `hb_coding_agent` operates through a clear, modular architecture. User commands are received via the **User Interface (CLI)**, which then initiates a request to the **Agent Core**. The `Agent Core` acts as the brain, processing user input and determining the necessary actions. For complex reasoning and code generation, it interacts with the **LLM Interface**, which abstracts the communication with the Google Gemini model. When external operations are required, the `Agent Core` consults the **Tool Registry** to discover and invoke specialized tools. These tools include the **File System Adapter** for interacting with the local file system and the **Code Quality Module** for performing static code analysis. All operational parameters and sensitive information are managed by the **Configuration Service**, which provides essential settings to the `Agent Core`, `LLM Interface`, and `Tool Registry`, ensuring secure and consistent application behavior. This design promotes clear separation of concerns, making the system maintainable and scalable.

components.name: User Interface (CLI)
components.description: The primary interface for users to interact with the coding agent, handling command-line input and displaying outputs.

components.name: Agent Core
components.description: The central orchestrator of the ReACT loop, interpreting user requests, managing LLM interactions, and deciding on tool usage.

components.name: LLM Interface
components.description: Provides a standardized abstraction for interacting with the Google Gemini Large Language Model, managing prompt formatting and API communication.

components.name: Tool Registry
components.description: Manages the registration, discovery, and invocation of all available tools, acting as a central hub for tool execution.

components.name: File System Adapter
components.description: Provides a controlled and sandboxed interface for the agent to interact with the local file system, enabling read and write operations.

components.name: Code Quality Module
components.description: Integrates static code analysis tools to evaluate the quality, style, and potential issues within code generated or modified by the agent.

components.name: Configuration Service
components.description: Centralized management for application settings, environment variables, and sensitive credentials, ensuring consistent behavior across components.

components.name: Unclassified
components.description: Component for all unclassified files and utility functions (Utility functions/External Libraries/Dependencies)
